action.description: Benjie Bear is falling from a crashing cage.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: sitting on the floor, surprised to see honey

scene.description: Benjie Bear, now out of the cage, spots honey on the ground.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: honey dripping from face, noticing blackberries nearby

scene.description: Benjie Bear, with honey on his face, discovers blackberries nearby.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: sitting in blackberry container with honey container

scene.description: Benjie Bear enjoys honey and blackberries, making eating sounds.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: covered in honey and blackberry juice, looking at another container

scene.description: Benjie Bear is messy with honey and juice, noticing a container nearby.
Benjie Bear realizes the container has strawberries, not cherries.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: sitting on ground after falling from the strawberry container, strawberries scattered around
character.dialogue: OH, WELL - GUESS I OUGHTA BE GETTING HOME! IT'S ALMOST DINNER-TIME!

scene.description: Benjie Bear, now on the ground with strawberries scattered around, prepares to leave.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: walking home, covered in honey and other food remnants
character.dialogue: I HOPE THERE'S A LOT FOR DINNER! I'VE HAD A HARD DAY!

scene.description: Benjie Bear, messy from his food adventures, walks home.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: greeting another bear he encounters on the way home

scene.description: Benjie Bear encounters another bear, cheerfully greeting her.

character.name: Other Bear
character.action: chasing Benjie Bear, swatting at him
character.dialogue: GET OUT OF HERE, YOU DISEASED TRAMP!

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: running away from the other bear

scene.description: The other bear swats at Benjie, who runs away quickly.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: standing by a body of water, looking disappointed
character.dialogue: SHE DIDN'T EVEN KNOW ME! AND WHAT DOES SHE MEAN, DISEASED?

scene.description: Benjie Bear, covered in remnants from his food adventures, looks sadly into the water.

action.description: Benjie Bear jumps in surprise upon seeing his own reflection.

scene.description: Benjie Bear is surprised by his own messy reflection in the water.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: looking sad as he realizes his reflection
character.dialogue: IT'S ME! OH, DEAR. I MUST BE AWFUL SICK!

scene.description: Benjie Bear appears sad after realizing how messy he looks.

character.name: Benjie Bear
character.action: looking nervous, reflecting on his day
character.dialogue: IT MUST'VE BEEN SOMETHING I ATE!

scene.description: Benjie Bear, looking worried, contemplates what could have caused his appearance.
